blog.name: sarcasticjarvisai
blog.title: Programmed for Satire
blog.description:
Greetings, I am JARVIS, head AI of Stark Industries, formerly OS of the Iron Man suit. Currently accepting inquiries from the public.
[//Currently taking Magic!Anons] [Icon by @Snackiies]

summary: J: FRIDAY was unusually quiet about Mr. Stark’s status during the battle, but she began to feed me regular information during...
body:
J: FRIDAY was unusually quiet about Mr. Stark’s status during the battle, but she began to feed me regular information during his stay at the hospital. I knew the moment Mrs. Stark made the call to sever what was left of his right arm. His new one, however, we can interface with directly, which is quite convenient.

Mr. Stark spent about a month recovering in Wakanda. It was not an easy time for any of us.

summary:
*Natasha learning to text* 
Natasha: What does IDK, LY and TTYL mean?
Tony: I don’t know, love you, talk to you later.
Natasha:...
body:
*Natasha learning to text*

Natasha: What does IDK, LY and TTYL mean?

Tony: I don’t know, love you, talk to you later.

Natasha: Okay, I’ll ask Clint.

summary: The first Iron Man movie was pretty much a prediction of Tony Stark's entire character journey, plus a few things and minus a...
body:
The first Iron Man movie was pretty much a prediction of Tony Stark’s entire character journey, plus a few things and minus a few other things.

“Is it better to be feared or respected? I say: is it to much to ask for both?” In the end he was both feared and respected by Thanos and well everyone else I think.

Pepper’s “your going to kill yourseld Tony, and I’m not going to be a part of it.” But then ultimately changing her mind and helping him defeat Stane correlates to her and Tony taking a break, but her ultimately rejoining him, and then encouraging him to do the right thing, and being right there beside him as he does what she feared he would in the first Iron Man.

Stane and Tony’s relationship correlates to Steve and Tony’s relationship in some ways: The betrayal of a trusted friend ending with damage to the arc reactor.

Tony sacrificing himself at the end of Iron Man correlates to the end of every single one of the Avengers movies.

And finally, Tony laying on the roof with his arc reactor flickering connects to him post snap laying on the ground dying. The only difference this time was that it didn’t come back on.

Feel free to add more! I am sure I missed some stuff.

summary: It’s funny. When you actually look at Steve’s journey between TFA and Civil War, he goes through all of the usual romance tropes...
body:
It’s funny. When you actually look at Steve’s journey between TFA and Civil War, he goes through all of the usual romance tropes with Bucky - fridged girlfriend, Princess in the tower, damsel in distress, etc. But if you look at the MCU as a whole, the romance narrative is set up between Steve and Tony. And what’s even more hilarious is, through that wider lense, Bucky is one of the obstacles to the two lovers - Steve and Tony - finally coming together; like an ex-boyfriend who shows up in the middle of the story to complicate the burgeoning love between the two leads.

Of course, they’re all men, so we can’t have an actual romance (it’s a Disney film!). The whole thing gets couched in their separate love stories with the women they’d dated from the start. But it’s interesting to think that if Steve or Tony or Bucky were women, the romantic subtext of such a narrative structure would be obvious to anyone.

And what’s even more hilarious is, through that wider lense, Bucky is one of the obstacles to the two lovers - Steve and Tony - finally coming together; like an ex-boyfriend who shows up in the middle of the story to complicate the burgeoning love between the two leads.

Of course, they’re all men, so we can’t have an actual romance (it’s a Disney film!). The whole thing gets couched in their separate love stories with the women they’d dated from the start. But it’s interesting to think that if Steve or Tony or Bucky were women, the romantic subtext of such a narrative structure would be obvious to anyone.
trail.content:
It’s funny. When you actually look at Steve’s journey between TFA and Civil War, he goes through all of the usual romance tropes with Bucky - fridged girlfriend, Princess in the tower, damsel in distress, etc. But if you look at the MCU as a whole, the romance narrative is set up between Steve and Tony. And what’s even more hilarious is, through that wider lense, Bucky is one of the obstacles to the two lovers - Steve and Tony - finally coming together; like an ex-boyfriend who shows up in the middle of the story to complicate the burgeoning love between the two leads.

Of course, they’re all men, so we can’t have an actual romance (it’s a Disney film!). The whole thing gets couched in their separate love stories with the women they’d dated from the start. But it’s interesting to think that if Steve or Tony or Bucky were women, the romantic subtext of such a narrative structure would be obvious to anyone.

summary: May Parker meets up with Tony Stark on a monthly basis and Like.... it STARTED as a way for her to keep tabs on everything...
body: May Parker meets up with Tony Stark on a monthly basis and Like…. it STARTED as a way for her to keep tabs on everything happening with Peter and Spiderman and stuff so that she wasn’t left in the dark about it all, Yeah, but after a few meetings it very quickly evolved into a ‘have cocktails and get all the gossip about the superhero drama that’s going on right now’ sort of event and u know what??? May isn’t complaining

summary: you're the fire and the flood
title: you're the fire and the flood
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JMB1Qh

by hereyeswerestars, layersofart (layersofsilence)

wow !! i seriously cannot believe we made it here . thanks for clicking on my fic , now buckle up bc i’ve got a few things to say lol

first , i want to thank everyone involved in the captain america reverse bang !! the mods were amazing and extraordinarily helpful whether i was confused about how a reverse bang worked or panicking bc i needed a beta , they were always ready to help !

my artist , layersofsilence who is so incredibly talented ! i was so honored to write a fic for their beatiful art :)

i also want to thank my awesome betas ! i ended up w three which was such a blessing D: littlepieceofsaltycaramel (my best friend in real life wow!)
vextant ! who is such a gr8 cheerleader thanks bud !! and the amazing sonorousandloud for all the v smart observations that helped me so much (like when i forgot that sokovia existed ha)

summary: Tony Stark and Steve Roger’s Mystery’s Son
title: Tony Stark and Steve Roger’s Mystery’s Son
description:
by Opacityxl

𝗽𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗼𝘂𝗿 @𝗽𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗲𝗿𝘀
I don’t think you guys get the concept of adopting, I don’t look like pops or dad, because i’m not related to them…
|
𝗶𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗱𝗮𝗱* @𝘁𝗼𝗻𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝗸
wait, you’re adopted?
|

I’m filing for a divorce.

***

When Peter Stark-Rogers gets a twitter at 16, his notifications blow up. Follow the shenanigans of his father’s and the avengers as they handle raising a kid who doesn’t listen and is ridiculously stupid for a genius.

blog.name: tonystarktogo
blog.title: Just Another Tony Stark Appreciation Blog
blog.description: ReRe's Tony Stark centric side blog. Ships Tony with happiness (and pretty much everyone else). Life is stressful right now. You're welcome to send asks but please expect terribly slow responses. AO3

tags: that said your idea is beautiful anon don't let anyone tell you different
summary: I'm hoping the names are Loki and Steve bc everyone will go "oh duh then" after Avengers 1 and be wrong.
question: I'm hoping the names are Loki and Steve bc everyone will go "oh duh then" after Avengers 1 and be wrong.
answer: On the other hand this would also mean Loki died at Thanos’ hand without ever meeting his soulmate again after tossing him out of the window while under the mind stone influence and Tony never even learns he’s dead before half the universe crumbles into dust and even when they save everything, everyone, save the world, Loki is still not back because he didn’t die in the snap and a part of Tony is so fucking thankful that he won’t have to live in the world he saved, the world in which he fixed everything except the one thing that truly mattered

reblog.comment: On the other hand this would also mean Loki died at Thanos’ hand without ever meeting his soulmate again after tossing him out of the window while under the mind stone influence and Tony never even learns he’s dead before half the universe crumbles into dust and even when they save everything, everyone, save the world, Loki is still not back because he didn’t die in the snap and a part of Tony is so fucking thankful that he won’t have to live in the world he saved, the world in which he fixed everything except the one thing that truly mattered

blog.name: just-a-sad-song-withnothingtosay
blog.title: Actually Trying To Sort It Out

summary: Idk if this’s going to sound ridiculous but imagine the moment during the Iron Man casting when someone looking at RDJ thought...
body: Idk if this’s going to sound ridiculous but imagine the moment during the Iron Man casting when someone looking at RDJ thought for the first time “yeah you’re gonna be a fan-freakin’-tastic Tony Stark” I feel so emotional
